original_text: Once more he visited Cana in Galilee, where he had turned the water into wine. And there was a certain royal official whose son lay sick at Capernaum.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 갈릴리 가나에 이르시니 전에 물로 포도주를 만드신 곳이라 왕의 신하가 있어 그의 아들이 가버나움에서 병들었더니

sentences.original_text: Once more he visited Cana in Galilee,
where he had turned the water into wine.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 그는 물을 포도주로 바꾸었던 곳이었다.

sentences.original_text: And there was a certain royal official
whose son lay sick at Capernaum.
